Enroll Course

PHP Crash Course

Course Highlights Take a step in the right direction with this exclusive PHP Crash Course - course developed by Cybderdude Networks

Requirements

  1. - No formal qualifications required, anyone from any academic background can take this course.
  2. - Access to any internet-enabled smart device.

Learning outcome

  1. - Learn how to install Xampp and Sublime
  2. - Gain knowledge about Basic Syntax
  3. - Familiar yourself with Single vs Double Quotes
  4. - Learn about different data types and operators

Why should I take this course?

  1. - 3+ hours of on-demand video lectures and downloadable resources.
  2. - Affordable premium-quality E-learning content, you can learn at your own pace.
  3. - You will receive a completion certificate upon completing the course.

Course Curriculum

  1. Introduction
  2. Installation
  3. Basic Syntax and First Steps
  4. Data Types
  5. Operators
  6. Statements
  7. Loops
  8. Arrays
  9. Functions
